column4: is there something i can use to monitor a user using ssh on my server?
proberly not without them setting somthing up.. or you having some things setup beforhand to log what hes doing..
'screen' can be used to share a session with someone so you both can see whats going on at the same time.. theres other tools out i think also
there used to be some ttysnoop type tools.. but you need to have them setup  befor the users start connecting i recall.
